original_text: And Balaam said unto the ass, Because thou hast mocked me: I would there were a sword in mine hand, for now would I kill thee.
korean_text: 발람이 나귀에게 말하되 네가 나를 거역하기 때문이니 내 손에 칼이 있었더면 곧 너를 죽였으리라

sentences.original_text: And Balaam said unto the ass
I would there were a sword in mine hand
for now would I kill thee
